description: This Java class implements transaction-related services such as fund transfers and utility payments within a banking microservice. It interacts with repositories and models to process transactions, validate account balances, and generate transaction responses.

classes.name: TransactionService
classes.description: A service class managing transactions such as fund transfers and utility payments, including validation and persistence.

methods.name: fundTransfer
methods.description: Handles the logic for transferring funds between accounts, validating balance before executing the transfer.

methods.name: utilPayment
methods.description: Processes utility payments, validates account balance, and records a utility payment transaction.

methods.name: validateBalance
methods.description: Checks if the account has sufficient balance for the transaction, throwing exception if not.

methods.name: internalFundTransfer
methods.description: Executes the internal logic of transferring funds between accounts, updating balances and saving transaction records.
